attributes.action: Break ties with Europe and become stronger economic allies with the U.S.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The E.U. has for many years been bleeding this nation dry with it's stupid rules and regulations and demanding that we take more "new" European immigrants that create more of a strain on our already oversubscribed welfare system. We should break ties with the E.U. and become stronger economic allies with the U.S.
The U.S. would not be a replacement for the E.U., but a more viable alternative!
We are losing our identity as a nation and our closest links have always been with the U.S. and should remain so. We stop funding Europes' bureaucratic nonsense and concentrate on our own nations shortcomings.
